Class CcddLinkManagerHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddLinkManagerHandler

    • CcddLinkManagerHandler

      CcddLinkManagerHandler(CcddMain ccddMain, CcddLinkManagerDialog linkDialog, String rateName, String[] availableRates)
      Link manager handler class constructor
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class
      linkDialog - Reference to the link manager dialog that created this link manager handler
      rateName - Data stream rate column name
      availableRates - Array of sample rates available to this stream

      Parameters:

    • setLinkAndFields

      private void setLinkAndFields(String linkName, boolean canCopy)
      Set/clear the selected link, enable/disable the description, rate, and size in bytes fields, and enable/disable the dialog's buttons that apply only if a single link is selected based on if a valid link name is provided
      Parameters:
      linkName - Name of the selected link; null if no link or more than one link is selected
      canCopy - True if the copy operation is allowed (i.e., one or more links is selected)

    • createArrowButtonPanel

      private JPanel createArrowButtonPanel()
      Create a panel to contain a pair of arrow buttons. Make all but the button icons transparent
      Returns:
      JPanel containing the arrow buttons in a vertical layout

      Parameters:

    • removeVariableFromLink

      private void removeVariableFromLink(String[] linkNames)
      Remove the selected variable(s) from the link and reenable them in the variable tree
      Parameters:
      linkNames - Array containing the name(s) of the link(s) from which to remove the variable(s)

    • cleanUpLinks

      private void cleanUpLinks(String[] linkNames)
      Clean up the links following the addition or deletion of a variable
      Parameters:
      linkNames - Array containing the name of the link(s) to be updated; null to perform the cleaning but without updating the link fields

    • cleanUpLinks

      protected void cleanUpLinks()
      Clean up the links following an undo/redo operation

    • isLinksChanged

      protected boolean isLinksChanged()
      Check if the links differ from those last committed to the database
      Returns:
      True if the link definitions have changed

    • getInvalidatedLinkMembers

      protected List<String> getInvalidatedLinkMembers()
      Get a list of link member variables that are no longer valid for the telemetry scheduler table due to the addition of one or more new member variables. If a telemetry message references a linked variable, and a new variable is added to the link definition, then the message no longer references all of the variables that are linked. Since the additional variable(s) may not fit within the message's maximum size, all of the variable in the link are removed from the message(s). The user must add the linked variables back to the messages using the telemetry scheduler
      Returns:
      List of link member variables that are no longer valid for the telemetry scheduler table due to the addition of one or more new member variables; and empty list if no links are invalid

    • selectLinkByVariable

      private void selectLinkByVariable()
      Select the link in the link tree for which the selected variable in the variable tree is a member
